question: Give me all bills of materials
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT ?bom
WHERE { 
  ?bom a pv:BillOfMaterial .
}

question: Gib mir alle Stücklisten
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT ?bom WHERE { 
  ?bom a pv:BillOfMaterial . 
}

question: Give me all hardware pieces deeper than 28mm
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT ?hardware WHERE { 
    ?hardware a pv:Hardware ; 
             pv:depth_mm ?depth . 
    FILTER (?depth > 28) 
}

question: Geben Sie mir alle Hardwareteile, die tiefer als 28 mm sind
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT ?hardware WHERE {
  ?hardware a pv:Hardware ;
            pv:depth_mm ?depth .
  FILTER (?depth > 28)
}

question: I need all hardware pieces heavier than 5 grams
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT ?hardware WHERE { 
    ?hardware a pv:Hardware ; 
              pv:weight_g ?weight . 
    FILTER (?weight > 5)
}

question: Ich brauche alle Hardwareteile, die schwerer als 5 Gramm sind
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT ?hardware
WHERE {
    ?hardware a pv:Hardware ;
              pv:weight_g ?weight .
    FILTER (?weight > 5)
}

question: Which products are categorized as Hardware and what physical dimensions (height, width, depth) can be stored for them?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT ?hardware ?height ?width ?depth WHERE {
    ?hardware a pv:Hardware .
    OPTIONAL { ?hardware pv:height_mm ?height . }
    OPTIONAL { ?hardware pv:width_mm ?width . }
    OPTIONAL { ?hardware pv:depth_mm ?depth . }
}

question: Welche Produkte sind als Hardware kategorisiert und welche physischen Abmessungen (Höhe, Breite, Tiefe) können für sie gespeichert werden?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT ?hardware ?height ?width ?depth WHERE {
    ?hardware a pv:Hardware .
    OPTIONAL { ?hardware pv:height_mm ?height . }
    OPTIONAL { ?hardware pv:width_mm ?width . }
    OPTIONAL { ?hardware pv:depth_mm ?depth . }
}

question: How many suppliers exist?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT (COUNT(?supplier) AS ?supplierCount)
WHERE { 
  ?supplier a pv:Supplier .
}

question: Wie viele Lieferanten gibt es?
query:

PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT (COUNT(?supplier) AS ?supplierCount)
WHERE { 
  ?supplier a pv:Supplier .
}

question: How many members has each department?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?department (COUNT(?agent) AS ?memberCount)
WHERE {
  ?agent pv:memberOf ?department .
}
GROUP BY ?department

question: Wie viele Mitglieder hat jede Abteilung?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?department (COUNT(?agent) AS ?memberCount)
WHERE {
  ?agent pv:memberOf ?department .
}
GROUP BY ?department

question: What contact information can be stored for Agents (including Employees) in this knowledge graph?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?agent ?email ?phone ?addressText WHERE { ?subClasses rdfs:subClassOf* pv:Agent . ?agent a ?subClasses . OPTIONAL { ?agent pv:email ?email } OPTIONAL { ?agent pv:phone ?phone } OPTIONAL { ?agent pv:addressText ?addressText } }

question: Welche Kontaktdaten können für Agenten (einschließlich Mitarbeiter) in diesem Wissensgraphen gespeichert werden?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT ?agent ?email ?phone ?addressText WHERE { ?subClasses rdfs:subClassOf* pv:Agent . ?agent a ?subClasses . OPTIONAL { ?agent pv:email ?email } OPTIONAL { ?agent pv:phone ?phone } OPTIONAL { ?agent pv:addressText ?addressText } }

question: What information is captured about Suppliers, and how are they connected to Products?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?supplier ?id ?name ?label ?country ?addressCountry ?addressCountryCode ?supplierLocality ?connectedProduct WHERE { ?supplier a pv:Supplier ; rdfs:label ?label . OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:country ?country . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:addressCountry ?addressCountry . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:addressCountryCode ?addressCountryCode . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:addressLocality ?supplierLocality . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:id ?id . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:name ?name . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier wgs84:lat ?lat . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier wgs84:long ?long . } OPTIONAL { ?connectedProduct pv:hasSupplier ?supplier . } }

question: Welche Informationen werden über Lieferanten erfasst und wie sind sie mit Produkten verbunden?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?supplier ?id ?name ?label ?country ?addressCountry ?addressCountryCode ?supplierLocality ?connectedProduct WHERE { ?supplier a pv:Supplier ; rdfs:label ?label . OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:country ?country . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:addressCountry ?addressCountry . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:addressCountryCode ?addressCountryCode . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:addressLocality ?supplierLocality . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:id ?id . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier pv:name ?name . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier wgs84:lat ?lat . } OPTIONAL { ?supplier wgs84:long ?long . } OPTIONAL { ?connectedProduct pv:hasSupplier ?supplier . } }

question: How are Product Managers connected to Products in the data model, and what is their relationship to other Employees?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?product ?productManager ?directReport WHERE { ?subclasses rdfs:subClassOf* pv:Product . ?product a ?subclasses ; pv:hasProductManager ?productManager . OPTIONAL { ?productManager pv:hasManager ?directReport . }

question: Wie sind Produktmanager im Datenmodell mit Produkten verbunden und welche Beziehung haben sie zu anderen Mitarbeitern?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ecc: <https://ns.eccenca.com/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX vann: <http://purl.org/vocab/vann/>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?product ?productManager ?directReport WHERE { ?subclasses rdfs:subClassOf* pv:Product . ?product a ?subclasses ; pv:hasProductManager ?productManager . OPTIONAL { ?productManager pv:hasManager ?directReport . }
